DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether exercise program comprise strength endurance training lower fast insulin level group breast cancer survivor . Insulin may involve risk breast cancer recurrence .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Exercise Intervention Insulin Levels Breast Cancer Survivors
DOC.detailed_description: - All woman take part study take part exercise program . Group A start exercise immediately Group B wil delay period 16 week start exercise investigator look change insulin level occur woman exercise . - The exercise program make two part : strength ( weight ) training cardiovascular exercise . The strength exercise take place gym close Dana-Farber Cancer Institute . Patients work one one personal trainer twice week 50 minute . During session , participant brief warm period perform series Nautilus machine-based exercise guidance personal trainer . The goal session increase strength increase weight lift repetition . - Participants also cardiovascular exercise home . Each participant receive pedometer heart rate monitor . Women advise exercise least 30 minute three time per week keep journal recording long intensively exercise . Participants receive weekly phone call project manager review cardiovascular exercise . - Women undergo series measurement 16 week exercise intervention . They ask fast 12 hour prior measurement session . Measurements include blood test insulin glucose level . Women also weigh , height measure , body composition compute use noninvasive bioelectric impedance monitor , hip/waist measurement take . Group A participant undergo test time enrol study 16 week exercise . Group B participant undergo test enrollment , 16 week wait period end exercise program . - Participants also complete two survey mail , 3 month 9 month complete exercise portion protocol .
DOC.criteria: History pathologically confirm stage IIIIa invasive breast cancer Adjuvant chemotherapy and/or radiation must complete least 3 month prior enrollment Body mass index > 25 and/or body composition analysis > 30 Patients take herceptin Evidence residual distant disease Use medication expect affect insulin level Baseline exercise 20 minute two time per week Active malignancy Diabetes mellitus Heart disease uncontrolled hypertension Presence condition might expect impact participant 's ability perform physical activity
